Title: Yahya Sinwar was a key figure who united the fields against zioni...
Description: Yahya Sinwar was a key figure who united the fields against zionism, to the people of Yemen, he said: -I also extend my salute to the great Yemeni people, who have always stood by our Palestinian people and their just cause throughout history- and in regards to Lebanon and Iraq he said, -The unification of our efforts with you and our brothers in the valiant resistance in Lebanon and the Islamic Resistance in Iraq will break this enemy and bring about its defeat, paving the way for its expulsion from our land.-His legacy will live on in the hearts of every revolutionary. Thousands will rise after him to continue the path towards liberation. The martyrdom of our resistance leaders will not weaken the resolve of the masses, as history has shown that while martyrs leave this world, their ideas remain immortal guiding those after them. These enduring ideas, deeply rooted in the people of Palestine, will drive the struggle forward until the zionist entity is dismantled, in a free Palestine, within our lifetime.(3/3)

Title: Now as the Al-Aqsa Flood battle sparked on October 7, Yahya Sinwa...
Description: Now as the Al-Aqsa Flood battle sparked on October 7, Yahya Sinwar fought to keep his promise to liberate the thousands of Palestinian prisoners who remain in the occupation's dungeons. We remember and honor Yahya Sinwar as a fierce leader who did not waver, but advanced the struggle until his very last breath. In the 2021 war on Gaza, the occupation forces bombed his home in an attempted assassination attempt, but with pride, he returned home, sat on his furniture, and took a picture of himself humiliating the zionist entity. (2/3)

Title: 🖼 Yahya Sinwar, also known as -Abu Ibrahim-, the leader of the P...
Description: Yahya Sinwar, also known as -Abu Ibrahim-, the leader of the Palestinian resistance movement, and the commander fighting alongside his people in Gaza has ascended to martyrdom. Yahya Sinwar was martyred in the heart of Gaza, amongst his people leading them to the front lines. He did not cower away, but instead, he fought, led, and inspired thousands of revolutionaries to stand against genocide, in defense of the honorable Palestinian people. Yahya Ibrahim Hassan Sinwar ascended to martyrdom on the 17th of October, and he was born on the 19th of October in the Khan Younis Refugee Camp as his family was displaced from the city of Majdal Asqalan in 1948 during the ongoing Nakba. It was on the 18th of October, 2011 that Yahya Sinwar was released in the -Wafa al-Ahrar- prisoner exchange deal that liberated 1,027 prisoners held in the occupation's dungeons. (1/3)

Title: 🖼 Via ANONYMOUS: All out to court for Jordan Neely. October 21st...
Description: Via ANONYMOUS: All out to court for Jordan Neely. October 21st and every day of the trial. Manhattan Criminal Court 100 Centre. Part 54 Judge Wiley. 8 AM SHARP. #showoutforjordan

Title: 🖼 -Child body parts are scattered everywhere..We will witness mo...
Description: -Child body parts are scattered everywhere..We will witness more massacres like this as long as the world leaders sit back and watch.-These are the words of the 174th journalist to be murdered in Gaza, Wafa Aludaini. She was also mother of 3, married, a great friend, and someone who deeply believed in freedom for her people.  We pay tribute to Wafa, we hold her and her martyred family, as we honor all the martyrs of Palestine.  We invite the community to keep this memorial site going, and to confront AOC and all so-called progressive politicians who act as agents of empire.UPDATE: The memorial, which contained mourning art and photos of martyred children contributed by community members AOC represents, was taken down first thing this morning and shoved in the trash by AOC's staff. AOC's office has chosen to erase the memory of Palestinians. She continues to prioritize the imperial interests of Israeli apartheid over the basic Palestinian right to life.(5/5)

Title: 🖼 Guess what? We don’t condemn Hamas! We condemn politicians who...
Description: Guess what? We don’t condemn Hamas!  We condemn politicians who think they get to play with people’s lives. We condemn empire, which uses any made up justification at all to drop apartment blocks on people’s heads to further imperial expansion.-'Israel' made the desert bloom.- Kamala Harris, who AOC campaigns for, recently repeated this racist zionist adage.  A client told a Native comrade the week of indigenous people’s day: -it was impossible to grow watermelons before -Israel- because it was a desert.-  Zionists really think that there was no agriculture done by indigenous peoples of the entire levant, in the famed -fertile crescent- before they began their campaign to colonize Palestine.  This, while teenagers and children in Gaza are using shards of plastic and wire to construct tiny greenhouses for their seedlings, so that the people around them may have a bite of freshness to keep their spirits strong amidst US-backed forced famine and genocide.(4/5)

Title: 🎬 AOC ran point on spreading the propaganda that led to this gen...
Description: AOC ran point on spreading the propaganda that led to this genocide, including signing House Res 966 -condemning rape and sexual violence by Hamas- on October 7th.  That was debunked, but has been weaponized to justify mass lynching of Palestinians ever since.-Hamas is a terrorist organization- Ocasio-Cortez said, as she signed resolution 888 declaring -Israel- a jewish ethnosupremacist homeland. -Hamas are terrorists,- she repeated over and over as she maligned NYC-based Palestinian, Arab and Muslim organizing, where they are targeted/beaten/doxxed/surveilled/threatened with murder—for refusing to condemn resistance to colonization by any means necessary. Harris and Biden -are working tirelessly for a ceasefire- she said as they send more than 8.7 billion in September 2024, rounding out an unprecedented year of money to -Israel- in full military support of its genocide (17.9 billion).  (3/5)

Title: 🖼 COMMUNIQUE: AOC: Ain't Our Comrade Astoria NY: AOC your hands ...
Description: COMMUNIQUE:AOC: Ain't Our ComradeAstoria NY: AOC your hands are red, over 200,000 dead!  We charge you with genocide, and for openly working with genocidal war criminals Butcher Biden and Holocaust Harris.  We are disgusted by your zionism; how you continue to defend -Israel's- right to exist as a settler colony on top of Palestine -as a jewish homeland.- We are a multi ethnic crew including anti zionist jews, and know that anyone who equates jews with -Israel- is not to be trusted. -Israel- is immoral and will be dismantled.  On Wednesday night, a group of actionists gathered outside AOC’s Astoria office to create an ongoing public memorial site of those lost in -Israel’s- American-funded genocide of Palestine and invasion of Lebanon, especially highlighting child martyrs. We also redecorated surrounding areas to share the kind of treachery the politician has been involved in.(2/5)

Title: 🖼 Last night, activists took action to protest AOC at her Astori...
Description: Last night, activists took action to protest AOC at her Astoria office by holding a vigil for the martyrs of Palestine after over a year of lies about supporting a ceasefire as she continues to co-opt progressive politics to run cover for Biden, Harris, and the Democratic Party's genocide in Gaza. The memorial featured Shaban Al-Dalou, the young Palestinian who was filmed burning to death after the occupation bombed refugee tents next to Al-Aqsa Martyrs Hospital. AOC has shamelessly already torn down the memorial this morning, hoping to hide the blood on her hands as she desecrates any attempt to honor the over 300k Palestinians murdered with our taxes. We call on all New Yorkers in solidarity with Palestine to continue taking creative action to confront all those complicit and responsible for the annihilation of our people. Read the actionists communique here: (1/5)

Title: Within Our Lifetime joins the National Lawyers Guild in condemnin...
Description: Within Our Lifetime joins the National Lawyers Guild in condemning the US and Canada's attack on Samidoun and the escalating crackdown on Palestine:-The National Lawyers Guild is outraged by the expanded use of anti-terrorism laws to attack social movements. Like the L.A. 8, this targeting of Samidoun, Khaled Barakat and the Palestinian liberation movement is also an embarrassment to the rule of law, and we call on all peoples of conscience to stand with us as we defend human rights advocates and social movements that practice their constitutional right to freedom of speech, against the genocide of the Palestinian people. We must fight back before it is too late. An attack on one is an attack on all!-Read the NLG's full statement here: nlg.org/nlg-condemns-t…National Lawyers Guild - -Human rights over property interests-NLG Condemns the State’s Unwillingness to Disrupt White Supremacy; Looks Beyond the Justice System for Meaningful Change - National…The National Lawyers Guild (NLG) is outraged by the events taking place in the concurrent trials of Kyle Rittenhouse and the murderers of Ahmaud Arbery. It is once again extremely clear that the state will maintain its investment in fascism, anti-Blackness…

Title: This city is killing us slowly. What’s it gonna take to make spac...
Description: This city is killing us slowly. What’s it gonna take to make space to breathe? It’s gonna take us recognizing ourselves as a people. It’s gonna take new practices of logistics of care and protection of each other for us, by us: the Black Brown Indigenous & Migrant New Yorkers that bear the brunt of all the ways this city suffocates us in our lives. Who bear the brunt of all of its agencies and entities that are ALSO the police. ITS GONNA TAKE US PRACTICING FREEDOM. THE PEOPLE FIGHT BACK!(2/2)

Title: 🎬 From @ thepeople.fightback on Instagram: We are tired of this....
Description: From @ thepeople.fightback on Instagram:We are tired of this. Tired of eviction notices and housing court. Tired of the shelter system. Tired of chasing the social worker. Tired of submitting paperwork. Tired of not qualifying. Tired of the waiting list. Tired of the bullshit job. Tired of the promises of a better job. Tired of the negative balance in our account. Tired of thinking of ways to get money and coming up short. Tired of the end of the month when rent is due. Tired of the groceries not lasting to the first of the month. Tired of the threat of ICE coming around. Tired of cops jumping out on us and humiliating us on the block. Tired of catching a summons or jail time or a bullet for not having train money.. WE ARE FUCKING TIRED. (1/2)

Title: After witnessing all of the hospital bombings israel has conducte...
Description: After witnessing all of the hospital bombings israel has conducted in the past year, it is easy to forget how the US media worked so diligently to make us believe that they would never do such a thing after the occupation forces bombed Al-Ahli hospital nearly one year ago today on October 17, 2023. We in the US bear responsibility for this genocide as our government and mainstream institutions have been funding and manufacturing consent for the annihilation of our people. Those of us in the belly of the beast, who continue to fund these atrocities with our tax dollars, must not normalize this violence. The time to act is now. Rise and Resist.(2/2)

Title: 🎬 As the zionist entity grows increasingly desperate to delay it...
Description: As the zionist entity grows increasingly desperate to delay its inevitable collapse, it has escalated the genocidal aggression against the people of Gaza beyond comprehension. Hours ago the occupation forces bombed Palestinians seeking refuge around Al-Aqsa Martyrs Hospital in Deir Al-Balah, central Gaza, burning them alive in the tents where they were sleeping. This attack followed a successful operation by the resistance in neutralizing military forces. Attacking critical health infrastructure has been a consistent part of the occupation’s strategy to destroy life in Gaza and carry out this genocide.(1/2)

Title: 🖼 For the ninth day in a row, occupation forces have continued t...
Description: For the ninth day in a row, occupation forces have continued their siege of the Jabalia refugee camp in northern Gaza. This continued siege comes as part of the enemy's plan to displace Palestinians in Jabalia camp. As green-lighted by the United States, the occupation’s primary partner I n facilitating this ongoing genocide, it is clear that this is a coordinated plan to starve, displace, and massacre as many Palestinians in Jabalia as possible.For the past year, the zionist entity has aimed to destabilize the resistance in Jabalia, after failing to defeat the resistance in northern Gaza, particularly in the camp. The IOF have again resorted to cowardly tactics through horrific airstrikes targeting schools, hospitals, and residential areas. Over the past nine days alone, at least 300 Palestinians have been martyred during the ongoing siege of Jabalia. Yet even in the face of this unthinkable violence, our people declare: -Long live the camp, and long live the invincible spirit of Jabalia.-

Description: Happening TODAY, October 10th: join the 2nd public NOISE DEMO at Brooklyn Navy Yard at 4pm to continue to escalate pressure against local genocide profiteers. It has now been one year of US-Israeli genocide in Gaza, and the zionist entity has expanded their attacks into the West Bank, Lebanon, Syria, and Yemen. All the while, companies at Brooklyn Navy Yard have quietly been equipping the IOF with the technology used to carry out mass slaughter. This must stop. Through sustained, collective action, we will force Brooklyn Navy Yard to terminate their contracts with Easy Aerial and Crye Precision and cut ties with the military industrial complex.(1/2)

Description: We humbly offer this framework FIRE THE CITY OF NEW YORK as a living document to reorient our struggles towards each other. To highlight pressure points and targets. To build as they destroy. We will offer useful information, political education, calls for outreach support and amplification as well as calls to action! 📢 + 📋= 🤜🏾💥🤛🏾The bullhorn AND the clipboard… 🌱✊🏾(2/2)

Title: 🖼 The People Fight Back organized three contingents from The Bro...
Description: The People Fight Back organized three contingents from The Bronx, Brooklyn, and Queens to take liberated train rides and join our October 7th march. Follow their work @ thepeople.fightback on Instagram and read their founding statement here:THE PEOPLE FIGHT BACK welcomes you. We are a collective of collectives who organize autonomously with our respective crews & comrades in our communities. We have come together to articulate our conditions of unfreedom from the poor and struggling margins of the Empire State who aren’t at your marches and protests. We want to point to the interconnectivity of our struggles and lovingly turn our attention (and hopefully yours too) towards the margins and the material conditions there that prevent the people rising up together! When we say we want everybody outside. WE MEAN EVERYONE! (1/2)

Title: The zionist entity makes the miscalculation of believing that the...
Description: The zionist entity makes the miscalculation of believing that the martyrdom of Lebanese resistance leader Sayyed Hassan Nasrallah this past weekend will leave the country vulnerable for invasion. But as Palestinian intellectual and martyr Basil Al-Araj wrote, -Those who have died and those who will die will never affect the resistance's system and cohesion because the structure and formations of the resistance are not centralized but horizontal and widespread.- The resistance is in the hearts of 100,000 fighters ready to defend their land and they will do just that.The resistance defeated the zionist occupation in Lebanon twice before, and it will do it again.⁩(3/3)

Title: As the Lebanese resistance prepares for an invasion, the zionist ...
Description: As the Lebanese resistance prepares for an invasion, the zionist forces are escalating their attempts to trigger a regional war by bombing Damascus, Syria as well as the Ain al Hilweh Palestinian refugee camp in South Lebanon last night. Multiple people were wounded and killed in both strikes including Hassan Al-Maqdah, a Palestinian resistance fighter in Ain al Hilweh, and Safaa Al-Ahmed, a Syrian journalist in Damascus. She was martyred shortly after covering the israeli aggressions in both Lebanon and Syria.At the same time as the zionist entity was carrying out these aggressions across the region, Yemen was demonstrating its fearlessness once again, striking Tel Aviv with its second hypersonic missile as the IOF was mounting a sea of tanks at the Lebanese border. Today, Palestinians have conducted multiple shooting operations in Yafa and Tel Aviv while resistance fighters have fended off zionist occupation forces’ attempts to besiege Nablus once again. Just now, Iran launched a barrage of missiles at israel. The past days’ developments make clearer than ever that we are all linked — from Palestine to Lebanon to Syria to Yemen to Iran and beyond. Despite the borders that divide us, our peoples' resistance unites us.(2/3)

Title: 🖼 ⁨The movement for Palestinian liberation is a movement in supp...
Description: ⁨The movement for Palestinian liberation is a movement in support of the Lebanese, Iranian, and Yemeni people and their resistance forces as they defend their region from zionist invasion, airstrikes and assassinations for resisting the genocide in Gaza.After a week of non-stop terror attacks starting with the explosion of thousands of pagers and continuing with brutal arial bombardment of civilian infrastructure in South Lebanon and Beirut, israel has attempted to launch its ground invasion but has so far failed. Their aim this past week has been to shock and stun the Lebanese people to a point where they do not have the capacity to fight back. They are gravely mistaken.(1/3)

Title: The Al-Aqsa Intifada then, and our people’s unwavering resistance...
Description: The Al-Aqsa Intifada then, and our people’s unwavering resistance to this day, from Gaza, Jenin, Tulkarem, Nablus, Al-Quds, Al-Khalil, to the occupied interior in 1948 and beyond, embodies our people’s refusal to surrender and steadfastness in fighting for liberation by any means necessary, passed on from generation to generation.From Zakaria Zubeidi’s generation, the generation who led the armed struggle during the Al-Aqsa Intifada from the camps in the West Bank, the struggle was later passed on to the cubs who grew up during the Intifada like the freedom fighters and martyrs Abu Shujaa, born in 1998 in Nur Shams camp in Tulkarem, and Ibrahim Al-Nabulsi, born five years later in 2003 in Nablus.While zionists seek to vilify the word Intifada and demonize Palestinian resistance, the world has come to see the Palestinian cause as a heroic struggle in the face of settler colonialism, ethnic cleansing, genocide and annihilation.Until liberation and return within our lifetime, the Intifada will continue.🇵🇸 (2/2)

Title: 🖼 Twenty four years ago on September 28th 2000, the Al-Aqsa Inti...
Description: Twenty four years ago on September 28th 2000, the Al-Aqsa Intifada launched a new chapter of Palestinian resistance, from mass popular uprisings in the streets, to the iconic images of Palestinian youth throwing stones at tanks, to armed struggle waged by Palestinian resistance groups.The Al-Aqsa Intifada was ignited when the zionist war criminal Ariel Sharon stormed the Al-Aqsa Mosque compound under the protection of over 1,000 occupation forces in an act of provocation that was condemned around the world. Sharon’s actions caused outrage amongst Palestinians, who reacted to the attack on Al-Aqsa by confronting and resisting zionist forces throughout Palestine.Over the course of the Al-Aqsa Intifada, nearly 5,000 Palestinians were martyred resisting the zionist enemy.When the Oslo Accords were signed in 1993, the late Palestinian intellectual Edward Said reacted by saying, -Let us call the agreement by its real name: an instrument of Palestinian surrender.- (1/2)

Title: On the path to liberating Al-Quds and Palestine, he has always be...
Description: On the path to liberating Al-Quds and Palestine, he has always been on the front lines supporting our people in their fight against the zionist entity. For the past 11 months, Lebanon has sacrificed everything for simply confronting the zionist aggression of Gaza. The martyrdom of such a figure may generate feelings of despair, but resistance does not rest in one man's hands — it is in the hearts of millions who refuse to abandon Palestine. Thousands will rise from his place in the earth to challenge this cruel world and carry on our people's task. The weight of his martyrdom will crash down on the heads of the settler colony.-We will not abandon Gaza and its people, Palestine, and the sanctities of the nation in Palestine, no matter the circumstances, challenges, and sacrifices. Any hopes of silencing the support fronts are futile. What we started 11 months ago, we will continue, no matter the intimidations and sacrifices.- These are the eternal words of Sayyed Hassan Nasrallah, even after his martyrdom, his ideas and legacy will remain a beacon of hope for thousands to honor after him.(2/2)

Title: 🖼 Within Our Lifetime mourns the martyrdom of Sayyed Hassan Nasr...
Description: Within Our Lifetime mourns the martyrdom of Sayyed Hassan Nasrallah, leader of the Lebanese resistance and a symbol of the steadfast struggle to liberate Palestine. Nasrallah was killed by the zionist entity along with several other members of the resistance's senior leadership amid a hailstorm of bombs which rained down on the Beirut suburb of Dahiyeh yesterday, killing hundreds and destroying entire city blocks in the process.Nasrallah built up a guerrilla force and led the Lebanese resistance to defeat the far more advanced israeli occupation of South Lebanon in 2006. As the era of national liberation struggle seemed to come to a close on the global stage, their actions represented the dawn of a new path towards victory and dignity. It is no surprise that the genocidal zionist project would eagerly slaughter countless people in Lebanon — as they have done for decades without justification — in order to extinguish this fire.(1/2)

Title: 🖼 Join Global Citizen Exposed TODAY Saturday at 2pm at 86th Stre...
Description: Join Global Citizen Exposed TODAY Saturday at 2pm at 86th Street and Central Park West in NYC. Disrupt the celebrity-fueled Global Citizen Festival, which coincides with the UN General Assembly and will be attended by a who’s-who of the world’s political and corporate elite. If Global Citizen's mission is to -defeat poverty, demand equity, and defend the planet-, why is the organization – and this event -- funded and directed by genocide and climate change profiteers like Citi and Cisco?They want to pat themselves on the back for their phony humanitarianism; we’re calling them out on their corruption and coming to ruin their party.

Title: 🎬🖼 Moments after butcher Benjamin Netanyahu gave a speech at th...
Description: Moments after butcher Benjamin Netanyahu gave a speech at the United Nations, the IOF fired a series of airstrikes in Dahiye, the southern suburb of Beirut. The IOF attack resulted in the complete destruction of at least 6 buildings. Multiple people ascended to martyrdom, while several more are still left under the rubble. It is without a doubt that the US has given the green light for this massacre as Netanyahu gave the orders to attack Lebanon shortly after his speech at the United Nations during his visit to the United States.

Title: 🖼 For nearly one year, the NYPD has brutally assaulted, hospital...
Description: For nearly one year, the NYPD has brutally assaulted, hospitalized, and arrested thousands of protestors resisting the ongoing genocide in Palestine and now Lebanon. We have strength in numbers. When we have more bodies on the street, they cannot control us. Now more than ever, we need every ally of Palestine to show up and condemn all forms of repression across the movement.Join our Demands:•Resignation of Eric Adams•Disband the NYPD’s Strategic Response Group•Closure of the NYPD Office in occupied Palestine(2/2)

Title: 🖼 As thousands of New Yorkers flooded Manhattan’s -frozen zone- ...
Description: As thousands of New Yorkers flooded Manhattan’s -frozen zone- last night to protest the arrival and upcoming speech of Butcher Netanyahu’s at the UN General Assembly this morning, the NYPD incited another egregious riot against New Yorkers, arresting and injuring dozens.The NYPD’s violence and aggression exemplifies that they will continually prioritize protecting the forces of imperialism and zionism over the safety and rights of the people of NYC.At least two protestors remain in state custody and we encourage people to go to 100 Centre Street in Manhattan to show them support for a possible arraignment.(1/2)

Title: 🖼 ‼️Community leader Abdullah Akl has been released‼️ After NYPD...
Description: ‼️Community leader Abdullah Akl has been released‼️After NYPD violently arrested him at our emergency protest for Palestine and Lebanon, sent him to the hospital, and held him in custody for nearly 24 hours WOL leader Abdullah Akl has been released.As a result of mounting community pressure, the DA has declined to prosecute the case, demonstrating that the NYPD’s arrest was unjust — making his injuries all the more enraging. Make no mistake, this arrest was a targeted attack on the Palestine movement and the Muslim community of New York.Although our brother has been released, our campaign for justice against the NYPD's months of targeted brutality against our communities as we fight for Palestine has only just begun. We call on all Muslim and Arab community organizations to uplift and share these demands among their networks:1. The resignation of Eric Adams2. The disbandment of the NYPD’s Strategic Response Group3. Shut down NYPD’s office in occupied Palestine

Title: 🖼 ‼️URGENT CALL FOR COURT SUPPORT‼️ We are calling on comrades, ...
Description: ‼️URGENT CALL FOR COURT SUPPORT‼️We are calling on comrades, allies, and our community to come to 100 Centre St in Manhattan, ASAP for our brother and WOL leader Abdullah Akl’s arraignment, and demand his immediate release!Abdullah has been held in NYPD custody for over 18 hours despite being sent to the hospital with serious injuries and denied medication, after last night's violent arrest. We want to welcome him and the other arrestees being currently arraigned, with a sea of support and friendly faces, come out and bring your keffiyehs. 🇵🇸

Title: ↩️🖼 🚨UPDATE: As of 3:30pm, Abdullah is still in state custody a...
Description: WOLPalestine: NYPD brutalizes, arrests, and hospitalizes multiple protestors, including WOL Leader Abdullah Akl. Following months of barbaric brutality from the NYPD, we demand: 1. The resignation of Eric Adams 2. The disbandment of the NYPD’s Strategic Response Group… 🚨UPDATE: As of 3:30pm, Abdullah is still in state custody and is waiting to be arraigned. He was treated at a hospital and transferred to central bookings around 5am. He was with an attorney and family member in the hospital and they have reported he is conscious and alert. An attorney attempted to deliver prescribed medication but was turned away by police and court staff. We expect him to be arraigned later today and will provide updates as we receive them. Abdullah has shown up for his community and his people endlessly, it’s time we show up for him. For now, we ask that friends and comrades post the statement and graphics on the WOL Twitter/X account to expose the NYPDs violence against not only Abdullah, but dozens of other New Yorkers. Folks should also feel encouraged to make their own statements to show wider community support for Abdullah and all New Yorkers of conscience protesting against this genocide. NYPD violence cannot continue to be normalized. #WeStandWithAbdullah

Title: As the United Nations hosts war criminals from around the world i...
Description: As the United Nations hosts war criminals from around the world in NYC, the zionist entity is bombing Gaza and Lebanon with the full backing, diplomatic and military support from the U.S. war machine. Since Monday, the occupation’s indiscriminate bombing of Lebanon has resulted in 550 martyrs and counting, and nearly 2,000 more wounded. On Thursday we take to the streets not only in protest of Butcher Benjamin Netanyahu, but to confront U.S. imperialism, zionism and all those enabling the ongoing genocide in Gaza and the current bloodbath in Lebanon, which includes the UN itself. Meanwhile the NYPD, whose foot soldiers routinely brutalize and murder Black and Brown New Yorkers with impunity and who just days ago shot multiple people on the subway, are responsible for the -security- of the UN General Assembly. The NYPD, embroiled in federal investigations, resignation and scandal, has said that all pedestrian traffic during the UNGA will be shut down east of 2nd Avenue, showing just how afraid they are of losing control with so many eyes on NYC. Join us and action on Thursday Sept. 26th and show the world that street closures won't stop us. Move like water, split into streams and take action throughout the day using the map above. Then join us for a central rally at 6PM at Pershing Square (42nd St. & Park Ave) where we will flood the streets for Gaza, Palestine, Lebanon, Yemen and all our people resisting around the world. Keep an eye on Twitter & Telegram for location updates. 🇵🇸🇱🇧🇾🇪
